mapper.select: SELECT A.WFFCLTY_CD , A.WFFCLTY_NM , A.WFFCLTY_TP , (SELECT COMMCD_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE COMMCD = A.WFFCLTY_TP AND COMMCD_FG = C.COMMCD_FG AND USE_FG = '1') AS WFFCLTY_TP_NM , B.OGNZT_NM , A.UNIQUE_NO , (SELECT WFFCLTY_NM FROM WFFCLTY_BASE F WHERE A.HIGH_WFFCLTY_CD = F.WFFCLTY_CD) AS HIGH_WFFCLTY_NM , DECODE(A.OPERATE_FG,'0','미운영','운영') AS OPERATE_FG , DECODE(A.USE_FG,'0','미사용','사용') AS USE_FG FROM WFFCLTY_BASE A , ORGANIZATION B , (SELECT COMMCD , DECODE(COMMCD,'A','WF02','B','WF03','C','WF04','D','WF05','E','WF06') AS COMMCD_FG FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE COMMCD_FG = 'WF01' AND USE_FG = '1') C WHERE A.OGNZT_CD = B.OGNZT_CD AND A.WFFCLTY_CLAS = C.COMMCD AND A.WFFCLTY_CD = #{wffcltyCd}

SELECT A.WFFCLTY_CD , B.ZIP_CD , B.ADDR_BASE , B.ADDR_DETAIL , (SELECT COMMCD_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE COMMCD_FG = 'CG01' AND USE_FG = '1' AND COMMCD = B.GU_CD) AS GU_CD , B.PHONE_NUM , B.FAX_NUM , B.INTENDANT_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.ESTABLISH_DD, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ESTABLISH_DD , B.WORKER_CNT , B.WORKER_DETAIL , B.HOMEPAGE_URL , B.GOVSUBY_FG , B.CITSUBY_FG , B.GUSUBY_FG , NVL(TRIM(B.OWNERSHIP_TP),'') AS OWNERSHIP_TP , B.OWNERSHIP_ETC_DETAIL , NVL(TRIM(B.REVENUE_SOURCE_TP),'') AS REVENUE_SOURCE_TP , B.REVENUE_ETC_DETAIL , NVL(TRIM(B.LUNCH_TP),'') AS LUNCH_TP , B.LUNCH_ETC_DETAIL , B.CAPACITY , B.AREA , B.ETC_DETAIL1 , B.ETC_DETAIL2 , B.ETC_DETAIL3 , B.ETC_DETAIL4 , B.ETC_DETAIL5 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WFFCLTY_ENTER D WHERE A.WFFCLTY_CD = D.WFFCLTY_CD AND D.LVHS_DD IS NULL) AS NOW_CAPACITY FROM WFFCLTY_BASE A , WFFCLTY_DETAIL B WHERE A.WFFCLTY_CD = B.WFFCLTY_CD(+) AND B.WFFCLTY_CD = #{wffcltyCd}
SELECT WFFCLTY_CD ,DISABLE_TP ,DISABLE_DETAIL FROM SERVICE_DISABLE_TYPE WHERE WFFCLTY_CD = #{wffcltyCd}
SELECT A.WFFCLTY_CD||ROWNUM AS ID , A.* FROM(SELECT WFFCLTY_CD ,PICTURE_NM ,PICTURE_NM AS PICTURE_REAL_NM ,PICTURE_PATH FROM WFFCLTY_PICTURE WHERE WFFCLTY_CD = #{wffcltyCd} ) A

SELECT A.WFFCLTY_CD , A.WFFCLTY_NM , A.WFFCLTY_TP , (SELECT COMMCD_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE COMMCD = WFFCLTY_CLAS AND COMMCD_FG = 'WF01'AND USE_FG = '1' ) AS WFFCLTY_CLAS , (SELECT COMMCD_VALUE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE COMMCD = A.WFFCLTY_TP AND COMMCD_FG = C.COMMCD_FG AND USE_FG = '1') AS WFFCLTY_TP_NM , B.OGNZT_NM , A.UNIQUE_NO , (SELECT WFFCLTY_NM FROM WFFCLTY_BASE F WHERE A.HIGH_WFFCLTY_CD = F.WFFCLTY_CD) AS HIGH_WFFCLTY_NM , DECODE(A.OPERATE_FG,'0','미운영','운영') AS OPERATE_FG , DECODE(A.USE_FG,'0','미사용','사용') AS USE_FG FROM WFFCLTY_BASE A , ORGANIZATION B , (SELECT COMMCD , DECODE(COMMCD,'A','WF02','B','WF03','C','WF04','D','WF05','E','WF06') AS COMMCD_FG FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE COMMCD_FG = 'WF01' AND USE_FG = '1') C WHERE A.OGNZT_CD = B.OGNZT_CD AND A.WFFCLTY_CLAS = C.COMMCD AND (A.WFFCLTY_CD LIKE '%'||#{wffcltyCd}||'%' OR A.WFFCLTY_NM LIKE '%'||#{wffcltyCd}||'%')
